title: Please add multi-cpu/socket support for Bash.
body: Right now I'm only able to see one of my CPUs on bash.  It would be great to have full support for 2-4 sockets as well.  That way we can utilize the full performance of our hardware.

comments.body: Works fine for me on dual Xeon E5520, Windows 10 Pro Creator's Update and Fall Creator's Update 16299.15. I see all 16 threads in /proc/cpuinfo and they get used by 16-thread ffmpeg (with suitable encoders that scale out that much).
